# twingate_connector (Resource)

Connectors provide connectivity to Remote Networks. This resource type will create the Connector in the Twingate Admin Console, but in order to successfully deploy it, you must also generate Connector tokens that authenticate the Connector with Twingate.

`TODO add example`

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **remote_network_id** (String) The ID of the remote network to attach the connector to

### Read-Only

- **id** (String) Autogenerated ID of the connector in encoded in base64
- **name** (String) Autogenerated name of the connector (can't be changed)
